About Brooke

Brooke is a writer, poet and a good story-teller based in Georgia. You can find her on Instagram at @brookewardx14 .

Support my work!

I do a lot of things: I write, draw, stream, and also drink a lot of tea. I would love to keep doing what I love to do, but these things take time in energy. That's where you come in. By supporting what I do, I have less to worry about so I can go back to doing what I love üíñ
